description:
---

### [choco://vnc-viewer](choco://vnc-viewer)
To use choco:// protocol URLs, install [(unofficial) choco:// Protocol support ](https://chocolatey.org/packages/choco-protocol-support)

---

![Screen shot of VNC Viewer](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bcurran3/ChocolateyPackages/master/vnc-viewer/vnc-viewer_screenshot.png)

Make sure you've downloaded VNC Connect to the computer you want to control.

VNC Viewer is used to remote control RealVNC and VNC Connect hosts.

**SOCIAL MEDIA:**
[Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/realvnc) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/realvnc) | [Linkedin](https://www.linkedin.com/company/realvnc) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/user/RealVNCLtd)

**VNC SERVER SOFTWARE:**
[VNC-Connect](https://chocolatey.org/packages/vnc-connect/)

**VERSIONS ON OTHER PLATFORMS:**
[Android App](http://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.realvnc.viewer.android) | [iOS App](https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/vnc-viewer/id352019548?mt=8) | [Chrome Extension](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/vnc%C2%AE-viewer-for-google-ch/iabmpiboiopbgfabjmgeedhcmjenhbla) | [macOS Client](https://www.realvnc.com/download/viewer/macos/) |[Linux Client](https://www.realvnc.com/download/viewer/linux/)

**[PACKAGE NOTES](https://github.com/bcurran3/ChocolateyPackages/blob/master/vnc-viewer/readme.md)**

	

---
